actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #463 (345-64).

official_title: Resolution to establish as part of the congressional internship program an internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes each member of the House of Representatives (including Delegates and Resident Commissioners) to hire for two months during the year one additional employee to be known as a "Lyndon Baines Johnson congressional intern."

titles.title: Resolution to establish as part of the congressional internship program an internship program for secondary school teachers of government or social studies in honor of President Lyndon Baines Johnson, and for other purposes.
